    • Card

      public Card(int prestigePoints, CostType costType, HashMap<TokenType,Integer> tokenCost, String id)
      Creates a new card with provided prestige point amount, cost type and card type.
      Parameters:
      prestigePoints - Amount of prestige points associated to this card.
      costType - Cost type associated to this card.
      tokenCost - Token cost associated to this card.
      id - ID Associated to this card.

    • isPurchasable

      public boolean isPurchasable(Player player, List<Token> tokensToUse)
      Check if this card can be purchased by the player.
      Parameters:
      player - player that wants to purchase this card
      tokensToUse - tokens requested to use
      Returns:
      true if player has the funds (and/or bonuses) and no excess tokens given
